roleset.name: to corrupt, destroy, or weaken something
roleset.note: SUBVERT-V NOTES: Frames file for 'subvert' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from subvert.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: with Arg2
example.text: [The agency]-1 was so totally subverted [*-1]from the high principles of its founding that even the Soviets now wonder about an agency that [*T*-29] seemed so congenial to them .
example.arg: from the high principles of its founding

example.name: transitive
example.text: Future witnesses include a former federal S& L regulator who [*T*-1] has accused [the five senators] -2 of [*-2]-3 attempting [*-3] to `` subvert '' the regulatory process by [*-4] intervening on behalf of Mr. Keating .
example.arg: by [*-4] intervening on behalf of Mr. Keating
